channel.title: Cultural Bridges on Sustainable Community Development Hub
channel.description: Recent content in Cultural Bridges on Sustainable Community Development Hub

item.title: Music
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wxV-n9iSkEs Teddy Afro - Lambadina Download ArifZefen (by ArifSoft) on your iphone for free to get the latest and hottest Amharic songs… from: http://teddyafro.info/about/ Tewodros Kassahun aka Teddy Afro Born: July 14, 1976 Spouse: Engaged To Amleset Muchie Parents: Kassahun Germamo & Tilaye Arage An Excerpt from Biography They tried to show art without the five talents but failed to foretell either the boy’s life journey or his destiny. His father’s soul was inspired by goddess of art.

item.title: Simon Sinek- Love Your Work
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jDIZS4IQlQk Published on Jul 2, 2012 Simon Sinek speaks on how to be fulfilled by your job and how companies can better support and inspire the people who work for them. Simon Sinek at CreativeMornings New York, April 2012.

item.title: Street Roots Newspaper
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KvG5_1s3wAs Uploaded on Mar 6, 2008 Street Roots recently was awarded a volunteer innovation award from the Hands on Greater Portland and the Portland Trail Blazers A brief look into Street Roots, a Portland non-profit newspaper that, “Assists people experiencing homelessness and poverty by creating flexible income opportunities. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VtQevs0Frc8

item.title: Alternative Indigenous Development Foundation Acceptance Speech - 2011 Ramon Magsaysay Awards
item.description: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yFfQWgNj8WI http://www.transformationalleadershiphq.com Speech during the Awarding Ceremony of the 2011 Ramon Magsaysay Awards held at the Cultural Center of the Philippines on Aug 31, 2011. Alternative Indigenous Development Foundation Category
